verses.content: Chu lai chun, Isu chu châwlniin bu bilah a fe thleng a; a inchûktirhai chu an phîng a ṭâm a, buvuihai chu an thliek a, an fâk tah a.
Chun, Pharisaihaiin chu chu an hmu chun a kuomah, “En ta, i inchûktirhaiin Châwlnia thaw thieng naw chu an thaw hi,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun an kuomah, “A ruolhai le an phîng ṭâm laia David thilthaw kha in tiem ngai naw am a nih?
Khânga Pathien inah a lût a, ama le a ruolhai fâk thieng naw, thiempuhai chau ifâk thieng entirna bei an fâk thu kha?
Annawleh, Châwlniin Pathien biekina thiempu umhai chun Châwlni an bawr khawmin an thiem pei ti Dân thua chun in tiem naw am a nih?
Iengkhawm ni sien, Pathien biekin nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um ti ka hril cheu hi.
Nisienlakhawm, ‘Inthâwina dit loin lunginsietna ka dit,’ ti hi a umzie hre thiem sa ni unla chu, mi thiemhai chu thiemnaw in inchangtir naw ding bah.
Mihriem Naupa hi Châwlni Lal a ni sih a,” a ta.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun a feh a, an inkhâwmna inah a va lût a.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat kut zeng a lo um a, chun, an hêk theina dingin, “Châwlniin sukdam a thieng am?” tiin Isu an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni laia tukhawmin berâm pakhat nei unla, chu chu Châwlniin khurah tla ta ang sienla, tuin am chelin kei dawk nâwng in ta?
Berâm pakhat nêk chun mi- hriem pakhat chu a va hlu lem de! Chuleichun, Châwlnia sukṭhat a thieng,” a ta.
Chu phingleh, chu mipa kuoma chun, “I kut phar rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a phar a, a khing tieng angin a dam ta var a.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai chu an suok a, ama an sukhlum theina ding dân ngaituoin an inrâwn a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn chu chu a hrietin, chutaka inthawk chun a fe hmang tah a.
Chun, mi tamtakin ama an zui a, an rêngin a lo sukdam vawng a, a chanchin phuong lo dingin an kuomah a ti tlat a.
Zâwlnei Isaiin hieng thu a hril hi a hung tlung theina dingin:
“En ta, ka siehlaw, ka ithlang, Ka idittak, ka lungrilin a ilâwm bêk bêk hi; A chungah ka Thlarau sieng ka ta, Chuongchun, Jentailhai kuomah rorêlna thu hril a tih.
Sêl naw nih a, khêk bawk naw nih a; Kawtthlêrhaia khawm tukhawmin a râwl hre bawk naw ni hai.
Hne dinga rorêlna a tir dawk hma khat chun Luong pawr suktan naw nih a, Pat khu khawm sukmit naw ni.
Ama hming chu Jentailhai chun beisei phâng an tih,” ti hi.
Chu lai chun, mitdel ṭawng- theinaw khawhri iman pakhat a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; chun, ama chun a lo sukdam a, chuongchun, ṭawngtheinaw chu a hung ṭawng theiin, a hung hmu thei tah a.
Chun, mipuihai po po chun mak an ti hle a, “Hi mipa hi David naupa chu a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Pharisaihaiin chu chu an hriet phingleh, “Hi mipa hin khawhri lal Beelzebub lei naw chun khawhrihai hnawt dawk naw ni,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, an kuomah, “Khâwlai ram khawm mâni indo taphawt chu an bo hlak; khâwlai khuo khawm sûngkhat khawm, mâni indo taphawt chu ngîr suok naw ni hai.
Setanin Setan bawk a hnawt dawk chun, mâni indo nîng a tih in sawnnaw; a ram chu iengtin am ngîr suok a ta?
Kei Beelzebub leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka lo ni chun, in nauhaiin tu leiin am an lo hnawt dawk hlak lie? Chuleiin, anni chu nangni ngaituotu dinghai nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, kei Pathien Thlarau leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka ni chun, Pathien ram in kuomah a hung tlung tah nîng a tih.
Chuongchu a ni si naw chun, miin mi hrât chu a khuop hmasa bak naw chun, iengtin am mi hrât inah lûtin a sum lapêk thei a ta? Chu hnunga ruok chun a in chu inrampêk el a tih.
Tukhawm keia tienga ṭhang naw chu a mi do a nih; tukhawm a mi lâk khâwmpui naw chun a sukdar a nih.
“Chuleiin, ka ti cheu hi, mi an suolna tinrênga le, Pathien an hril- sietna tinrênga chun ngaidam nîng an ta, Thlarau Inthieng meu hrilsetu ruok chu ngaidam ni naw ni hai.

Chun, tukhawm Mihriem Nau- pa sawisêl taphawt chu a sawisêlna chu ngaidam nîng a ta; tukhawm Thlarau Inthieng meu sawisêl taphawt chu a sawisêlna chu, hi dam sûnga khawm, hun la hung tlung dinga khawm chun, ngaidam ni naw nih.
“Thing chu a ṭha a, a ra khawm a ṭha, in ti naw nghâl an leh, thing chu a sie a, a ra khawm a sie, ti nghâl nghâl ro; thing chu a rain ân hriet sih a.
Rûl thlahai, nangnîn suol zing pumin, iengtin am thu ṭha hril thei in ta? Lungrila sip liem chu bauin a hril hlak in sawnnaw.
Mi ṭha chun a robâwm ṭhaa inthawkin thil ṭhahai a the dawk hlak, mi suol chun a robâwm siea inthawkin thil ṭha naw a the dawk hlak.
Chun, ka hril cheu hi, mihaiin thu teplo an hril taphawt, chuong thu chanchin chu ngaituo nia chun hril an tih.
I thuhril chun thiem inchangtir a ti cheh a, i thuhril bawk chun thiemnaw inchangtir a ti che i sawn- naw,” a ta.
Chu lai chun, Dân inchûktir- tuhai le Pharisaihai laia tuhaiin amanih an dawn a, a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, i kuoma inthawkin inchikna hmu kan nuom,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun an kuomah, “Ruolthar suoltak le uire hmang takhai chun inchikna an zawng a; nisienlakhawm, zâwlnei Jona inchik- na chau naw chu an kuomah inchikna hrim hrim pêk ni naw ni;
Jona chu ni thum le zân thum ngapui phîng sûnga a um ang khan, Mihriem Naupa hi ni thum le zân thum hnuoi khur sûngah a um bawk ding a nih.
Ninevi khuoa mihai chu ngaituo pha chun tulai ruoltharhai kuomah hin ngîr vêng an ta, thiemnaw inchangtir an tih; Jona thu hril leiin an sim sih a; Jona nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um in sawnnaw.

Simtieng lalnu kha ngaituo pha chun tulai ruoltharhai lai hin tho vêng a ta, thiemnaw inchangtir a tih; Solomon varna ngai ding hmanin kâwlkawdawnga inthawkin a hung sih a; ngai ta u, Solomon nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um in sawnnaw.
“Chun, khawhri inthieng naw chu mi sûnga inthawka a suokin, châwlna zawngin tui um nawna hmunahai ân vâk ân vâk a, a hmu ngai si nawh a.
Chun, ‘Ka suokna ina khan kîr nâwk el ka tih,’ a ta; chun, a va tlung chun, a ruoka, phît faia cheiṭhatin a hmuh a.

Chu phingleh a va feh a, ama nêka suol lem khawhri dang pasari a hung ṭhuoi a, chutaka chun an lût a, an um zing hlak a, chu mihriem um dân nuhnung lem chu a hmasa nêkin a hung ṭha naw lem hlak a nih. Chuong ang bawkin tulai ruolthar suol takhai chunga hin la um a tih,” tiin a dawn a.
Mipuihai kuoma thu a la hril lai chun, ngai ta, a nu le a unauhai chu ama biek tumin tuolah an ngîr a.
Chun, mi pakhatin a kuomah, “Ngai ta, i nu le i unauhai biek che tumin tuola sawn an ngîr zing ie,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun a hriltu kuoma chun, “Ka nu chu tu am a na? Ka unauhai khawm chu tuhai am an na?” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, a inchûktirhai tieng a kut a phar a, “En ta u, ka nu le ka unauhai hi!
Tukhawm ka Pa vâna mi dit zâwng thaw taphawt chu, ka unau le, ka farnu le, ka nuhai an nih in sawnnaw,” a ta.
